snippet: The brother of two Mexican cartel leaders was sentenced to 20 years in prison for running a money laundering operation from a horse ranch in Lexington, Okla., for his brothers.
abstract: Jose Trevino Morales, brother of Mexican cartel leaders Miguel Angel and Oscar Omar Trevino Morales, is sentenced to 20 years in prison for running a money laundering operation for his brothers from a horse ranch in Lexington, Okla.
lead_paragraph: The brother of two Mexican cartel leaders was sentenced to 20 years in prison for running a money laundering operation from a horse ranch in Lexington, Okla., for his brothers.

headline.main: Texas: Cartel Leaders’ Brother Sentenced in Money Laundering
headline.print_headline: Texas: Cartel Leaders’ Brother Sentenced In Money Laundering
